levels.description: Attack Range <@ba.vup>changes</>, Attack Interval <@ba.vdown>increases</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, and attacks <@ba.vup>{attack@max_target}</> enemies at once; when attacking, loses <@ba.vdown>{attack@hp_ratio:0%}</> HP and sets a burning field at the location of the target: passing enemies have <@ba.vup>{move_speed:0%}</> Movement Speed and take <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> of Blaze the Igniting Spark's ATK as Arts damage and <@ba.vup>{element_damage_scale:0%}</> of that Arts damage as <$ba.dt.burning2>Burn damage</> every second
